item.title: Antivirus Evasion for dummies
item.description: Long time huh? I just updated my website and i am hoping that you will like the new look and feel. I have been working recently on tons of AV solutions, trying to get the insight of how can one evade detection without using any crypters or obfuscation. Ahh, i know the topic is a bit touchy or you may think why am i discussing AV bypasses at the first place.
